portfolio.portfolioIntro: This is a show case of my passion for coding and design. I have created a few projects that I am proud of and I am always looking for new challenges. If you have a project in mind, don't hesitate to contact me.

top5PortfolioSection.subTitleTop5Portfolio: Projects that I am proud of
top5PortfolioSection.introTop5Portfolio: These are the projects that I am most proud of. They are a mix of creativity and functionality. I am always looking for new challenges and I am excited to see what the future holds.

frontendPortfolioSection.subTitleFrontendPortfolio: Projects that merge creativity and functionality.
frontendPortfolioSection.introFrontendPortfolio: I love creating beautiful and functional websites. I have created a few projects that I am proud of and I am always looking for new challenges. If you have a project in mind, don't hesitate to contact me.

frontendItems.title: BrutalBeats
frontendItems.subTitle: Frontend
frontendItems.description:
I designed and developed a responsive, mobile-first website for BrutalBeats Agency & Booking with a sleek dark theme. Future plans include integrating Node.js for contact forms and connecting the site to a CMS for easier management.
Purpose: Undertook the challenge of developing a website for BrutalBeats Agency & Booking, a newly established booking company. The primary requirement was to create a website with a dark theme, designed to be mobile-first and responsive. Future plans include integrating Node.js for handling contact requests through Nodemailer and connecting the site to a CMS system like WordPress or Umbraco.
Key Contributions:
- Frontend Development: - Utilized React and TypeScript to craft a responsive and intuitive user interface. - Implemented a mobile-first approach with Tailwind CSS for optimal user experience.
- Backend Development: - Managed backend development, ensuring seamless integration with frontend components. - Planned integration of Node.js for handling contact requests.
Technologies Used:
- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js
- Version Control: Git
- Terminal: Command Line Interface (CLI)
- Development Tools: Visual Studio Code
- CMS: Planned integration with WordPress or Umbraco
Challenges & Solutions: - Overcame challenges in implementing a dark theme while maintaining mobile-first responsiveness. - Planned and strategized for future integration with Node.js and CMS system.
Outcome: Successfully developed a basic structure and design for the website, with plans for further enhancements and integrations to improve user experience and functionality.

frontendItems.title: The Movie DB
frontendItems.subTitle: Frontend
frontendItems.description:
I developed an interactive web application that integrates the IMDb API to display movie data, focusing on a seamless and engaging user experience. Leveraging React, TypeScript, Axios, and React Query, I implemented advanced frontend functionalities, including efficient search capabilities, while ensuring reusable and maintainable components.
Purpose: In this project, I focused on frontend development, specifically advanced JavaScript using React. The task involved integrating the IMDb API and utilizing the Axios library along with React Query to fetch and display movie data. My goal was to create a user-friendly and interactive web application that offers a seamless experience to users.
Key Contributions:
- Utilized React and TypeScript to implement the frontend functionalities, ensuring a smooth user experience.
- Integrated external APIs and libraries, such as Axios and React Query, to fetch and manage movie data effectively.
Technologies Used:
- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Axios, React Query, SCSS
- Development Tools: Visual Studio Code
Project Highlights:
- Designed and organized components to ensure reusability and maintainability.
- Implemented efficient search functionality for users, enhancing the overall user experience.
Outcome:
This project not only strengthened my proficiency in React and frontend development but also provided me with valuable experience in handling and displaying data from external APIs. It has equipped me with the skills and confidence to tackle similar challenges in future projects.
Website: https://the-movie-data.netlify.app
GitHub: https://github.com/FiaNerd/TMDB

frontendItems.title: MSB
frontendItems.subTitle: Graphic Tools
frontendItems.description:
This project combines graphic design and web development, where I applied my skills in Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop to create graphic elements and illustrations. The course focused on building a website following the MSB graphic profile, incorporating typography, color schemes, and layout principles. I also gained hands-on experience with HTML and CSS to develop a responsive and visually engaging site.
Purpose: The Graphic Tools course aimed to provide foundational knowledge of Illustrator and Photoshop. In Illustrator, the objective was to create three distinct elements, while in Photoshop, the task involved clipping out at least three individuals. Additionally, the course emphasized adhering to the graphic profile of MSB (Civil Contingencies)[MSB Graphic Profile] (https://www.msb.se/) , focusing on typography, font sizes, color schemes, etc., and subsequently building a website using HTML and CSS following this profile.
Key Contributions:
- Created all graphic elements for the website, utilizing images composed of various other images. For instance, the Hero section and fire image were assembled from clipped-out images combined with other visuals.
- Ensured semantic correctness in HTML and CSS, employing flexbox and grid extensively to enhance frontend development techniques.
Technologies Used:
- Graphic Tools: Photoshop, Illustrator
- Frontend: HTML, CSS
- Development Tools: Visual Studio Code
Project Highlights:
- Utilized flexbox and grid layouts to create a visually appealing and responsive website.
- Emphasized adherence to the MSB graphic profile, enhancing understanding of design principles and brand consistency.
Outcome:
While the primary focus was on graphic tools, the project provided valuable insights into HTML and CSS, improving proficiency in frontend development. The project website showcases the application of design principles and techniques learned during the course.
Website: https://lucky-basbousa-252a0a.netlify.app/
GitHub: https://github.com/FiaNerd/msb_falling_trees_mission

backendPortfolioSection.introBackendPortfolio: Projects that combine creativity and functionality. My backend project is currently not live, but I have some experience in backend development, including database management, API integrations, and server administration. If you have an idea or a project in mind, don't hesitate to contact me. I look forward to collaborating and creating something amazing together.

backendItems.title: Photo App
backendItems.subTitle: Backend
backendItems.description:
I developed a backend for a photo app that allows users to upload, retrieve, update, and delete photos. By using Node.js, Express, Prisma, TypeScript, and MySQL, I created a secure and efficient database structure to store user information and photos. I also implemented a RESTful API to handle data transfer.
Purpose: The task was to develop a backend for a photo-sharing app that would store user information and photos in a secure and efficient manner.

backendItems.title: Slowfashion API
backendItems.subTitle: Backend
backendItems.description:
Contributed to the development of the Slowfashion app by supporting the backend developer in creating a comprehensive CRUD system for managing products and blog posts. Utilized tools like Swagger and Postman for extensive API testing and validation.
Key Contributions: - Developed a CRUD system for products and blog posts, significantly improving content management efficiency. - Enhanced my backend development skills in ASP.NET and API interaction. - Adapted to an existing project by thoroughly analyzing the codebase and deepening my understanding of software architecture.
Technologies Used: - Programming Language: C# - Framework: ASP.NET Core Web API - Databases: PostgreSQL, DBeaver - API Testing: Swagger, Postman, Insomnia - Version Control: Git - Cloud Services: Azure - Development Environment (IDE): Visual Studio 2022 Challenges & Solutions:
- Overcame challenges in understanding and adapting to the codebase of an existing project.
- Improved problem-solving and critical thinking skills through in-depth analysis and study.Outcome:

Successfully contributed to the development of a robust backend system for the Slowfashion app, gaining valuable experience in backend development and software architecture.

fullstackPortfolioSection.introFullstackPortfolio: Projects that combine creativity with robust functionality. I have extensive experience in both frontend and backend development, including database management, API integrations, server administration, and user-friendly design. Do you have an idea or a project in mind? Don't hesitate to contact me – I look forward to collaborating and creating something amazing together.

fullstackItems.title: Printagon Graphics
fullstackItems.subTitle: Fullstack
fullstackItems.titleDescription: System integration for a graphic company
fullstackItems.description:
Developing a mobile application to help high school students explore opportunities for post-secondary education, focusing on providing a seamless, cross-platform user experience.
Main Contributions:
- Frontend Development:
- Used React Native and TypeScript to create a responsive and intuitive interface.
- Ensured a consistent user experience across iOS and Android platforms.
- Backend Development:
- Managed APIs and data storage with Firebase, providing reliable backend services.
- Implemented SQLite for efficient handling of local data and offline functionality.
- Problem Solving:
- Overcame specific challenges in iOS development, ensuring robust cross-platform functionality.
- Adapted development strategies to maintain seamless performance and usability.
Technologies Used:
- Frontend: React Native, TypeScript
- Backend: Firebase, SQLite
- Version Control: Git
- Terminal: Command Line Interface (CLI)
- Development Tools: Visual Studio Code
- Methodology: Scrum
Challenges & Solutions:
- Solved complex iOS platform-specific issues, enhancing my problem-solving skills and technical knowledge.
- Ensured the app's responsiveness and performance across different devices and screen sizes.
Outcomes:
- Delivered a valuable tool that helps students effectively navigate their educational choices.
- Gained extensive experience in mobile development and cross-platform integration.

fullstackItems.title: Coffee Shop
fullstackItems.subTitle: Fullstack
fullstackItems.titleDescription: A coffee shop for coffee lovers
fullstackItems.description:
Embarked on a journey into full-stack development by creating an e-commerce platform tailored for coffee enthusiasts as part of my thesis project. Started with meticulous planning, I curated a tech stack that aligned with the intended functionalities, using SQL for user, cart, and product relations. By using both lo-fi and hi-fi prototypes in Figma, I refined the app's aesthetics, from color schemes to font choices.
Main Contributions:
- Frontend Development:
- Used React and TypeScript to orchestrate a seamless user experience.
- Enhanced aesthetics through careful design choices using Figma prototypes.
- Backend Development:
- Used ASP.NET Core to seamlessly integrate backend and frontend elements.
- Implemented robust backend authentication using the ASP.NET Core Authentication library.
Technologies Used:
- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: C#, ASP.NET Core, SQL Server
- Database: SQLite
- Development Tools: Visual Studio Code
- Version Control: Git
- Deployment: Docker (Planned integration for streamlined deployment)

Challenges & Solutions:
- Overcame challenges in implementing backend authentication, enriching my understanding of backend complexities.
- Planned integration of PostgreSQL for improved database management and Docker for streamlined deployment on an Azure-based server.

Outcomes: Successfully navigated the journey from concept to realization within set deadlines, enriching my skills and understanding of full-stack development. Looking forward, I aim to integrate PostgreSQL for improved database management and Docker for streamlined deployment on an Azure-based server.
